config.rayon.title: Physics Settings
config.rayon.option.gravity.tooltip:
The amount of gravity used by the physics simulation.
Performance Impact: Low
Default: -9.81 m/s^2
config.rayon.option.block_distance.toolt:
The maximum distance from a dynamic body entity where blocks are loaded.
Performance Impact: High
Default: 2 blocks
config.rayon.option.step_rate.tooltip:
The rate at which the simulation is stepped.
Performance Impact: High
Default: 60 steps/second
